original_text: And Pharaoh rose up in the night, he, and all his servants, and all the Egyptians; and there was a great cry in Egypt; for there was not a house where there was not one dead.
korean_text: 그 밤에 바로와 그 모든 신하와 모든 애굽 사람이 일어나고 애굽에 큰 부르짖음이 있었으니 이는 그 나라에 죽임을 당하지 아니한 집이 하나도 없었음이었더라

sentences.original_text: And Pharaoh rose up in the night
and there was a great cry in Egypt
for there was not a house where there was not one dead
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 죽은 자가 없는 집이 없었기 때문이더라
